    • Method Detail

      • sellItemToVendor

        public static boolean sellItemToVendor(Player player,
                                       Vendor vendor,
                                       Item item)
        Sell item to vendor. This method should be used to manage this kind of interaction. It checks if the player have the item, calls the purchase method from Vendor, adding the item's value to player's total gold Finally removes the item from player's inventory.
        Parameters:
        player - Player selling the item.
        vendor - Vendor purchasing the item.
        item - Item being sold.
        Returns:
        Returns true if operation was successfull. False otherwise.

      • buyItemFromVendor

        public static boolean buyItemFromVendor(Player player,
                                        Vendor vendor,
                                        Item item)
        Buy item from vendor. This method should be used to manage this kind of interaction. It checks if the vendor have the item. If yes, checks if player have the ammount of gold requiered to purchase the item. Then it calls the sell method from vendor and add the returned item to the player's inventory. Finally, removes the gold from player's total ammount.
        Parameters:
        player -
        vendor -
        item -
        Returns:
        Returns true if operation was successfull. False otherwise.

      • pickQuest

        public static boolean pickQuest(Player player,
                                QuestGiver questGiver,
                                Quest quest)
        Pick Quest. This method should be used to manage this kind of interaction. It checks if the player has the minimum level to pick the quest, then checks if the quest giver actually have the quest. If yes, calls the pickQuest method from the player and the giveQuest method from the quest giver.
        Parameters:
        player -
        questGiver -
        quest -
        Returns:
        Returns true if operation was successfull. False otherwise.

      • completeQuest

        public static boolean completeQuest(Player player,
                                    QuestGiver questGiver,
                                    Quest quest)
        Complete Quest. This method should be used to manage this kind of interaction. It checks if the quest is actually completed, then checks if the quest giver has this quest in it's given quests list. If yes, calls player's completeQuest method and pickItem method with quest giver's completeQuest method as paramater.
        Parameters:
        player -
        questGiver -
        quest -
        Returns:
        Returns true if operation was successfull. False otherwise.
